title: Interim Director of Athletic Communications - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Interim Director of Athletic Communications College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Coordinate and staff all home events with the purpose of recording stats, managing the game press box area, providing all announcements, and serving as the official scorer for all events...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
